description: We will teach you how to set up a simple and free wufoo Real Estate lead capture form. We will then show you how to use these simple forms to capture leads using Facebook ads to direct traffic to your form, posting form codes to Facebook news feed posts, embedding form codes onto your website or wordpress site and more. Learn our secrets to real estate lead capture using wufoo forms and start getting real estate leads as soon as today!
title: Getting Real Estate Leads Using WUFOO Forms
